intro: Dieffenbachia picta f. mirabilis, commonly known as the "Mirabilis Dieffenbachia," is a striking tropical plant native to South America. It is characterized by its large, glossy, dark green leaves with prominent white and yellow veins, creating a striking visual contrast. The plant belongs to the Araceae family and is known for its ability to thrive in low-light conditions. It is a popular houseplant due to its aesthetic appeal and relatively easy care requirements. However, it is toxic to pets and should be kept out of reach.
